Sandwiches.Name: French Dip Sandwich
Sandwiches.Description: Try our French Dip sandwich with a mouthwatering jus! Stuffing fresh bread rolls with tender beef along with melted provolone cheese, then dipping it into a perfect au jus.

Sandwiches.Name: Cubano Sandwich
Sandwiches.Description: Our Cubano sandwich is a combination of flavorful, juicy pork, Swiss cheese, pickles, mustard, and Cuban bread makes this dish an undeniable hit.
